metaface.server
Class HTTPServerWorker

java.lang.Object
  metaface.server.HTTPServerWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Worker
public class HTTPServerWorker
extends Object
implements Worker

Implements the Worker interface for the HttpServer and used by the server when spawning worker threads for incoming data.
